entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:17 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -42.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 09:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -42.4°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -46.5°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
